document_data.name: ''Qaraqib''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''qaraqib''''' ({{Pronounce|kah|rah|KEEB}}) was a set of clackers used by [[Zakhara]]n dancers.{{Cite dragon/190/Sounds of Wonder & Delight}}
document_data.Description: A dancer would hold two sets of ''qaraqib'' in each hand and manipulate them while moving about.
document_data.History:
It was rumored that some [[holy slayer]]s were able to use the ''qaraqib'' to secretly communicate with members of their fellowship.

The ''qaraqib'' was banned within the [[Cities of the Pantheon|Pantheist League]].
